=== Overview ===

QtTube should be able to detect and ask to continue a previously started but incomplete download of a video if the same filename is chosen. It should also be able to discover the ID of that video automatically.

<nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/qttube/+spec/continue-download|See this blueprint on Launchpad.]]</nowiki>
